commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: There are 30 types of sports and games at this recreation park, and you can play them to your heart's content! No time limit!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Wow, 30 types... Where do we even start?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh, so exciting! So exhilarating! I wanna do whichever one offers the most thrills! Like bungee jumping!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I wanna go bungee jumping!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: What? N-No, that's too scary, zura!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I don't think they have bungee jumping here.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: How about tennis? We're going to play all kinds of sports today, so we could have a light warm-up match first.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Tennis is much less scary, zura.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah, you get to keep your feet on the ground.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oh, tennis is fun too! Let's do it!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: All right, off to the tennis court it is!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Take that!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Hah!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Whoa, you actually returned it! Hiyaaah!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'll hit anything you throw at me!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Haaaaah! ...Oh...

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Game, set, and match! Won by Setsuna Yuki of Nijigasaki!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Noooo! I thought for sure my last smash woulda landed!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It was a miracle I could return that. That smash was a fastball! What a weighty, pure serve! It was jam-packed with your passion and determination for the game!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oh, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: But I still hate that I lost! I wanna play another match!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Th-That game was really was something, zura.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That felt less like a game and more like an all-out war.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: They went way past a light warm-up and got so hot we could barely see them... But I suppose it's no wonder since most sports are competitive.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Hmm... Hey, guys! Since we're all here at this rec park, why don't the six of us have a sports battle?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: A sports battle?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Yes, yes! We'll compete to see who can win the most after playing all 30 sports! And the champion will get a very special prize!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Ooh! Can we really do all 30?! I want to! I wanna do it!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You've gone and called it a competition, so I can't turn down this challenge! Now that I'm all fired up from my battle with Rin, I'm burning with a fighting spirit!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I think it'll be pretty hard to do every single sport here, zura... But...it does sound fun!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's worth giving it a shot!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: So you'll be in charge of the special prize, Mari? What are you planning for it?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: *Giggle* If you want to know, you'll have to win the battle!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Hehe! I got it. I'll soar to the top and nab that mysterious special prize!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: So it's settled! And of course, I'll be competing myself, and I've got my heart set on becoming champion! Let the rec park sports battle begin!
